ygData.subject: Re: Exploring the windmills
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well since the discovery of the Book of Wu (tailoring) on an un-named orc in lesser fey, and the fact that a gigantic disembodied hand drops a cooking
ygData.messageBody:
> tinkering to be a lore related skill, so they wouldn't just A: shove the
> book on some GOOD high level NPC, or B: put in in some weird place with no
> kind of information pointing to it anywhere!

Well since the discovery of the Book of Wu (tailoring) on an un-named orc in
lesser fey, and the fact that a gigantic disembodied hand drops a cooking
book. We can pretty much not rule out that they would put it in some weird
place with no kind of information pointing to it anywhere.
